item.title: Git Archive: Practical Guide for Efficient Packaging and Project Delivery
item.description: Git Archive: A powerful tool for efficiently packaging source code, making project delivery more professional. This article details how to use the git archive command to automatically exclude the .git directory and files in .gitignore, eliminating the need for manual filtering and generating clean project archives with a single command. Includes a useful PowerShell function that helps Windows users easily create standardized release packages. Compared to traditional compression tools, git archive is not only more efficient but also ensures consistency and professionalism in code delivery. An essential project delivery skill for developers.
